item.title: 中国批准 Synopsys 350 亿美元收购安世亚太
item.description: Synopsys 公司以 350 亿美元收购 Ansys 公司的交易已获得中国批准，为巩固美国公司在芯片设计软件领域的主导地位扫清了关键障碍。【原文：Synopsys Inc. has won Chinese approval for a $35 billion buyout of Ansys Inc., clearing a key remaining hurdle for a deal to shore up the US firm’s dominance of chip-design software.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将避免新关税带来的最坏影响
韩国对美国芯片征税的不确定性表示担忧
item.description: 韩国对美国可能对半导体征收关税深表担忧，贸易部长杨汉九（Yeo Han-koo）周一警告说，关税将对韩国的主要出口行业之一造成损害。【原文：South Korea is deeply concerned about tariffs the US is likely to impose on semiconductors, with Trade Minister Yeo Han-koo warning Monday of the damage the duties would inflict on one of the nation’s key export sectors.】

item.title: 中国稀土金属出口飙升至 2009 年以来最高水平
item.description: 官方数据显示，6 月份中国稀土出口量攀升至 2009 年以来的最高点，表明全球买家都在力争获得这种用于制造强力磁铁的材料。【原文：China’s exports of rare earths in June climbed to their highest since 2009, according to official data, indicating a push by global buyers to get hold of the materials used to make powerful magnets.】

item.title: 需求和国内产量疲软，中国煤炭进口进一步下降
item.description: 由于需求疲软和国内产量增加，中国的煤炭进口量降至两年多来的最低点。【原文：China’s coal imports fell to their lowest in more than two years on weak demand and higher domestic production.】

item.title: 刚果 "国王 "格特勒在仲裁证词中描述了矿山付款情况
item.description: 彭博社看到的一份仲裁决定描述了以色列亿万富翁丹-格特勒（Dan Gertler）的证词，他讲述了自己如何赢得刚果利润丰厚的自然资源的开采权，如何向刚果前总统的一名同伙支付此前未公开的款项，以及如何代表前总统和当地合作伙伴持有和出售合资企业的股份。【原文：An arbitration decision seen by Bloomberg describes Israeli billionaire Dan Gertler’s testimony about how he won rights to lucrative Congolese natural resources, made previously undisclosed payments to one of the former president’s associates, and held and sold stakes in ventures on behalf of him and local partners.】

item.description:
预测市场仍认为美联储主席有很大可能在今年结束任期。【原文：

item.title: 泰国计划对更多美国商品实行零关税以赢得关税协议
item.description: 泰国正在权衡允许更多美国商品零关税进入市场，以帮助说服特朗普政府降低对其出口产品征收 36% 关税的威胁。【原文：Thailand is weighing allowing zero-duty market access for more US goods to help persuade the Trump administration to lower a threatened 36% tariff on its exports.】

item.description:

item.title: 据说马尼帕尔将寻求 4.66 亿美元的债务来资助医院交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度曼尼帕尔教育与医疗集团正在与一家全球贷款机构进行谈判，以筹集约 400 亿卢比（约合 4.66 亿美元）的资金，帮助其收购 Sahyadri 医院。【原文：India’s Manipal Education & Medical Group is in talks with a group of global lenders to raise about 40 billion rupees ($466 million) to help fund its purchase of Sahyadri Hospitals, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据说日本央行可能考虑上调通胀预期
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，在大米和食品相关价格涨幅超过预期之后，日本央行官员可能会在本月晚些时候的政策会议上考虑上调至少一个通胀预期。【原文：Bank of Japan officials are likely to consider raising at least one of their inflation forecasts at a policy meeting later this month, after rice and food-related prices rose more than expected, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 比特币创下 12 万美元的历史新高，看涨势头不断增强
item.description: 比特币首次突破了 120,000 美元，投资者的乐观情绪几乎每天都在增加，因为比特币摆脱了窄幅交易区间，这让怀疑论者怀疑这种原始加密货币是否会重现年初创纪录的势头。【原文：Bitcoin breached $120,000 for the first time, with investor optimism increasing almost daily after it emerged from a narrow trading range that had left skeptics wondering whether the original cryptocurrency would regain the record-breaking momentum seen at the start of the year.】

item.title: 中国钢铁出口抵御保护主义浪潮创纪录
item.description: 中国第二季度的钢材出口量创下历史新高，世界第一大钢材生产国的钢材出口量打破了人们对从亚洲到欧洲的一系列贸易措施导致钢材出口量下降的预期。【原文：China racked up record steel exports in the second quarter, as flows from the world’s top producer defied expectations for volumes to fade under a barrage of trade measures from Asia to Europe.】

item.title: 首尔称朝鲜向俄罗斯供应了 1,200 万枚炮弹
item.description: 根据提交给一位韩国立法者的军事数据，自莫斯科发动乌克兰战争以来，朝鲜继续向俄罗斯提供数百万发炮弹和其他弹药。【原文：North Korea has continued to supply millions of artillery shells and other munitions to Russia since the start of Moscow’s war in Ukraine, according to military data submitted to a South Korean lawmaker.】

item.title: 马来西亚要求美国高端人工智能芯片的贸易必须获得许可
item.description: 马来西亚将要求美国高性能人工智能芯片的出口和转运必须获得许可，这表明马来西亚政府正在努力打击将敏感元件转移到中国等地的行为。【原文：Malaysia will require permits for exports and transshipments of high-performance US artificial intelligence chips, suggesting the government is seeking to clamp down on the diversion of the sensitive components to places like China.】

item.title: 贸易休战岌岌可危，中国出口增速回升
item.description: 受美国降低关税和主要海外市场需求强劲的推动，中国的出口增长自 3 月份以来首次加速。【原文：China’s export growth accelerated for the first time since March, driven by a reduction in US tariffs and robust demand from key overseas markets.】

item.title: 美国加征关税在即，欧盟官员称集团将探索亚洲契约
item.description: 一位高级官员表示，欧盟正在寻求深化与印度和亚太地区其他国家的贸易协定，因为该集团正在为美国加征关税做准备。【原文：The European Union is looking to deepen trade agreements with India and other countries in the Asia-Pacific region as the bloc braces for US tariffs, a top official said.】

item.title: 印度养老基金据称要求制定更宽松的债券投资规则
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，印度养老金管理公司已要求行业监管机构放宽对其可购买的公司债券期限的规定。【原文：Indian pension managers have asked the industry regulator to ease rules that mandate the tenor of company bonds they can buy, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 新堡垒扣押液化天然气，波多黎各电厂陷入瘫痪
item.description: 在新堡垒能源公司（New Fortress Energy Inc. ）取消向美国领土运送液化天然气后，波多黎各临时发电厂停工，有可能在夏季需求高峰期造成电网紧张。【原文：Puerto Rico idled temporary power plants after New Fortress Energy Inc. scrapped a liquefied natural gas shipment to the US territory, threatening to strain the grid at the height of summer demand.】

item.title: 特朗普关税政策震荡市场，印度股市将迎来疲软开局
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 简街存入 5.64 亿美元以遵守印度命令
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，简街集团有限责任公司（Jane Street Group LLC）已将 484 亿卢比（约合 5.64 亿美元）存入一个托管账户，以遵守印度证券市场监管机构的命令。【原文：Jane Street Group LLC has deposited 48.4 billion rupees ($564 million) in an escrow account to comply with an order from India’s securities market regulator, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 铁矿石在关键的中国经济数据公布前保持大幅周涨幅
item.description: 铁矿石保持了 1 月份以来的最大单周涨幅，交易商期待着中国公布的数据，该数据可能显示世界上最大的金属消费国第二季度的经济增长超过 5%。【原文：Iron ore held its biggest weekly gain since January, with traders looking ahead to the release of data in China that may show the economy of the world’s biggest metals consuming nation expanded more than 5% in the second quarter.】

item.title: LG电子股价因人工智能芯片齿轮开发报告而大涨
item.description: 当地媒体报道称，LG 电子公司正在开发尖端工具，用于制造与英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：LG Electronics Inc. shares advanced in Seoul after a local media report that the company is developing cutting-edge tools for making the memory chips that work alongside AI processors designed by Nvidia Corp. and others.】

item.title: 高盛认为亚洲的炎热天气将减缓液化天然气流向欧洲的速度
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）分析师萨曼莎-达特（Samantha Dart）等人在周日发布的一份报告中说，东北亚地区比平均水平更热的天气支持了该地区的液化天然气采购，而燃料竞争的加剧可能会减缓欧洲的进口量。【原文：Hotter-than-average weather across Northeast Asia is supporting LNG purchases in the region, and the increased competition for the fuel may moderate European imports, Goldman Sachs analysts including Samantha Dart said in a note released Sunday.】

item.title: 日本央行完成卸载银行股，ETF备受关注
item.description: 在 2000 年代初的国内银行业危机和后来的雷曼冲击期间，日本央行从被围困的银行手中购买了数百万美元的股票，日本央行完成了这些股票的出售，结束了近 20 年的出售过程，并使市场更加关注其规模更大的交易所交易基金的命运。【原文：The Bank of Japan finished selling millions of dollars of stocks it bought from besieged banks during a domestic banking crisis in the early 2000s and the later Lehman Shock, ending a nearly two decade process and bringing closer market attention to the fate of its much bigger pile of exchange-traded funds.】

item.title: 马斯克暗示特斯拉股东将就 xAI 投资进行投票
item.description: 在《华尔街日报》报道 SpaceX 准备向 Grok 聊天机器人开发商注资 20 亿美元后，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）表示，特斯拉公司计划就是否投资 xAI 的问题征求股东意见。【原文：Tesla Inc. plans to poll shareholders on whether to invest in xAI, Elon Musk said after the Wall Street Journal reported SpaceX was prepared to funnel $2 billion into the Grok chatbot developer.】

item.title: 日元交易员在日本大选前重整期权押注
item.description: 期权交易商开始对日本货币进行反向操作，其中一些人担心政治冲击、贸易冲突和美联储预期的变化会推动日元兑美元走低。【原文：Option traders are beginning to flip the script on Japan’s currency with some of them bracing for political shocks, trade flare-ups, and shifting Federal Reserve expectations to push the yen lower against the dollar.】

item.title: 政策鸽派、财政前景黯淡，印尼债券或将进一步上涨
item.description: 印尼央行的鸽派立场和对国家财政政策担忧的缓解，使人们更加期待政府债券将在下半年延续涨势。【原文：Bank Indonesia’s dovish stance and easing concerns over the nation’s fiscal policy are fueling expectation that government bonds will extend their rally into the second half of the year.】

item.title: 新加坡因建筑业和出口业增长强劲而避开衰退
item.description: 新加坡经济在第二季度有所增长，避免了技术性衰退，原因是建筑活动增加以及出口强劲，因为企业寻求提前应对美国提高关税。【原文：Singapore’s economy expanded in the second quarter, avoiding a technical recession on a rise in construction activity and strong exports as businesses seek to front-run higher US tariffs.】
